name: BDSIC 2019 CFP on Big-data Service and Intelligent Computation in Wuhan, China
content: Conference official website：http://www.bdsic.org Meeting time：October 18-20, 2019\. Meeting place：Wuhan, China. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： Prof. Chin-Chen Chang from Feng Chia University in Taiwan Published by： Accepted papers will be published into International Conference Proceedings, which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Inspec etc. Call for Papers： Foundational theoretical or computational models for big data. Innovative, concurrent, and scalable big data platforms. Data indexing, cleaning, transformation, and curation technologies. Visualization analytics for big data. urban planning, disaster management, security. Experiences and case studies of big data applications and services. Compressed Sensing and Sparse Coding. Natural Computing. Neural Networks. Signal Processing. Pattern Recognition. Biometrics Recognition. Image Processing. Information Security. Important Dates Deadline (full text) : July 01 2019\. Deadline (abstract) : July 25, 2019\. Registration Deadline: August 20, 2019\. Conference Contact :Ms. Ivy Wu mailbox: bdsic@acm-sg.org Tel: +86-021-59561560
